column21: Rationale
Defines functional unit, used for segmentation, fiducial for registering images

column21: Used to detect Collagen IV, see above
Expressed by naive B cells, provides mantle zone, poor performance (substitute with BCL2 or CD1c)

Essential marker for antigen presenting cells (B and myeloid), defines follicles, and germinal center (HLA-DR++)

Essential marker for cDC2 dendritic cells
Essential macrophage marker, defines multiple subsets enriched in medulla
Essential marker for dendritic cells, expressed by many cells
Essential marker for cytotoxic T cells

Key marker for T regulatory cells with FOXP3, activation marker for T and B cells

Marker for T follicular helper cells, activated T cells, use PD-1
Marker for fibroblastic reticular cells, follicular dendritic cells
Essential marker for T follicular helper cells, activated T cells
Activated T cells, B cells, NK cells, granulocytes, thymocytes, platelets, Langerhans cells
Activated T and B cells
Essential marker for lymphatic endothelial cells, expressed by some macrophages
Marker for follicular dendritic cells, macrophages, use CD21
Expressed by many myeloid cells (tingible body macrophages, M1, dendritic cells)

Many cells, fibroblastic reticular cells, myofibroblasts
